about_the_game:
EXPERIENCE A TASTE OF WHAT THE MAIN GAME WILL BE

In this demo you will be able to experience the core mechanics of the main game and personalize each bout by choosing between the forces of nature & the human-caused environmental effects, that you want to face.

Play and compete through the 4 seasons of the year, foraging and feeding the Queen to become her favorite.

The demo has no online multiplayer available. Instead, you can play locally with up to 6 friends from the same PC & couch or against the A.I.

PICK YOUR GAME CONFIGURATION

Set up your experience to enjoy the game differently with each attempt. Pick and mix the adversities you want to face, the number of questions to answer and the time to do so.

TUTORIAL

Ease into the game by quickly completing the tutorial and learning the tricks to becoming the Queen’s Champion.

QUIZ YOUR KNOWLEDGE OF BEE & POLLINATORS FACTS

At the end of each season, compete intellectually to stand out among the other players. Choose the right answer out of 4 options to score extra points!

LEARN ACTIVELY

Learn about pollination, flora and fauna, by going through the contents of the interactive Learning Tree.

CHOOSE YOUR INPUT

We recommend you play using a controller, but if you don't have one or enough of them, 2 players can join the game using the keyboard & mouse!

DON'T FORGET TO HAVE FUN!

Be it family or friends you are playing with, remember that even if competition gets fierce a game is a game - you can always try again! 🎮🐝

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
